items.name: Scrapli
items.description: Scrapli is a Python library focused on connecting to network devices (routers/switches/firewalls/etc.) via Telnet or SSH. It aims to be fast, flexible, and easy to use for both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

items.name: Netmiko
items.description: Netmiko is a multi-vendor library to simplify Paramiko SSH connections to network devices. It provides a unified API to connect to various network devices.

items.name: gNMIc
items.description: gNMIc is a gNMI client that provides full support for Capabilities, Get, Set and Subscribe RPCs with collector capabilities.

items.name: PyEZ
items.description: Juniper PyEZ is a Python library for managing and automating Juniper devices. It provides a Pythonic interface to the NETCONF API and other management interfaces.
